text: Mutinous dog, thought the Rev. Edwards, who hadn't enjoyed himself so much since Quelled, Mr. Price pulled out a grocery list, pushed his glasses up on his nose, and began to read. "Six loaves, four pounds butter, two pounds marge, one tin pineapple, one York ham."
handwritten_text: Mutinous dog, thought the Rev. Edwards, who hadn't enjoyed himself so much since Quelled, Mr. Price pulled out a grocery list, pushed his glasses up on his nose, and began to read. "Six loaves, four pounds butter, two pounds marge, one tin pineapple, one York ham."
